tool_description: Webscraper API to get current financial news for desired stock
name: Finanznachrichten Website Scraper
title: Finanznachrichten Website Scraper

api_list.name: Scrapes Website for current financial news for desired stock
api_list.description: Scrapes Website 'Finanznachrichten.de' for current German and English financial news for desired stock
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finanznachrichten-website-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/google"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finanznachrichten-website-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://finanznachrichten-website-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finanznachrichten-website-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
